item.title: Emote Help
item.dc:creator: @zamorak07 zamorak07
item.description:
@zamorak07 wrote:

How do i change the name of emotes? ive changed them all expect for laugh and on wards how do i change these? I use this for admin: case 170: // Admin tele
if(emotes == 0)
{
teleportToX = 2529;
teleportToY = 3494;
}
else
{
emotes = 0;
pEmote = playerSE;
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

but one game it still comes up laugh how do i change?

Read full topic
